summary: This is an email chain from August 12, 2019, forwarding a camera status report for the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) Brooklyn. The report indicates which surveillance cameras in the West and East buildings were operational as of August 9, 2019, at 12:30 PM.

persons.name: Electronics Technician M.D.C. Brooklyn
persons.context: The individual who authored the attached camera status report detailing which surveillance cameras were operational at the MDC Brooklyn facility.

events.title: Camera Status Report
events.description: A report was generated stating that specific surveillance cameras in the West Building (K-81, 82, 83, 84, West S.H.U.) and East Building (3-N, 3-S, 3-W, East S.H.U.) of the MDC Brooklyn were operational.

locations: Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) Brooklyn, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 12, 2019, forwarding a camera status report.
The attached report, dated August 9, 2019, confirms the operational status of specific surveillance cameras in the West and East buildings of the MDC Brooklyn.
The report was authored by an Electronics Technician at the MDC Brooklyn facility.
The document originates from the period shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody at the facility on August 10, 2019.
